name: Modern battle 3
description:
Are you ready for a action packed first person shooter ?

Modern battle 3 is a fast-paced FPS that will test your reflexes and tactical skill. Experience the thrill of modern brutal war as you fight a critical strike operation as a counter-terrorist or aim to cause destruction as a terrorist.

You can download and play the game now! We will keep working on the game continuously to fix bugs, improve optimization and add a ton of new features and content to the game!

You also can buy the bullets for your Handgun (M1911), Shotgun (828U), SMG (MP5K), Sniper gun (AWM, M82A3), assault (AK47, M4A1), nerf guns, machine guns, minigun (M134), rocket launchers (RPG 7) before starting each mission in modern strike

Recruit and train soldiers and lead them to the battlefield! Squadmates are very useful in modern strike.
